doc:
Monte Blue https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monte_Blue 0 Monte Blue (born Gerard Montgomery Bluefeather, January 11, 1887 – February 18, 1963) was a movie actor who began his career as a romantic leading man in the silent film era, and later progressed to character roles. Monte_Blue ( born Gerard_Montgomery_Bluefeather , January_11_,_1887 – February_18_,_1963 ) was a_movie_actor who began his_career as a_romantic_leading_man in the_silent_film_era , and later_progressed to character_roles .
